name: Aqua Blast
description:
Aqua Blast is a recreation of the popular analogic game "Aqua Rings".

It was made by two developers in a week as part of OpenJam2018.

The game is open source, you can check the code in this link.

We hope you have fun while playing it, feel free to contact us anytime!

- Team Rocket

Andrei Dilhe - andrei.dilhe@gmail.com - @bulbandrei

Rodrigo Nietiedt de Almeida - rodrigonietiedt@gmail.com - https://www.facebook.com/spicefroggames
